Name: Let's Learn Korean! Hangul
About the game: Want to learn to read Korean? Let's start learning Hangul! Study Hangul as you explore the Republic of Korea and learn about its culture, cuisine and history. Progress from learning single letters to reading complete words written in Hangul. Practice each new Hangul letter by playing fun mini-games, and you'll be reading Korean before you know it. Are you ready? Let's learn Korean!
